lore: Spooky Shades are born from the death of spies. Their instincts drive them to hide their identity by masking their appearance, which works as well as can be expected from a Shade. However, since these creatures can briefly put images of anything they've seen into the mind of another, many spies that work for sovereigns or crime syndicates continue doing so after death.
menagerieDialog: (It appears calm, but you should never lower your guard around a creature known for its trickery.)
(You could swear you saw this tricky little guy spying on you while you were in the privvy earlier.)
(It reaches behind your ear and, with a sly wink, produces a coin.)
(It disappears from your sight before sneaking up from behind and tickling you. Tee hee, stop that!)
(It's methodically approaching each of your creatures and shouting "BOO!" in their faces. You should probably release this creature from your service.)
name: Spooky Shade
